## Properties

| Property        | Attribute         | Description | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Default           |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| `direction`     | `direction`       |             | `"bottom-to-top" \| "left-to-right" \| "right-to-left" \| "top-to-bottom" \| { xs?: GridDirection; sm?: GridDirection; md?: GridDirection; lg?: GridDirection; xl?: GridDirection; }`                                                              | `'top-to-bottom'` |
| `hAlignContent` | `h-align-content` |             | `"center" \| "left" \| "normal" \| "right" \| "stretch" \| { xs?: GridHorizontalAlignContent; sm?: GridHorizontalAlignContent; md?: GridHorizontalAlignContent; lg?: GridHorizontalAlignContent; xl?: GridHorizontalAlignContent; }`               | `'normal'`        |
| `order`         | `order`           |             | `number \| { xs?: number; sm?: number; md?: number; lg?: number; xl?: number; }`                                                                                                                                                                   | `0`               |
| `spanColumns`   | `span-columns`    |             | `number \| { xs?: number; sm?: number; md?: number; lg?: number; xl?: number; }`                                                                                                                                                                   | `1`               |
| `spanRows`      | `span-rows`       |             | `number \| { xs?: number; sm?: number; md?: number; lg?: number; xl?: number; }`                                                                                                                                                                   | `1`               |
| `vAlignContent` | `v-align-content` |             | `"bottom" \| "center" \| "normal" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "top" \| { xs?: GridVerticalAlignContent; sm?: GridVerticalAlignContent; md?: GridVerticalAlignContent; lg?: GridVerticalAlignContent; xl?: GridVerticalAlignContent; }` | `'normal'`        |
